ygData.subject: Re: Destructor confronts Kit Kat
ygData.msgSnippet: Destructor saw his mistake. It had been the wrong time. I am sorry. I could not hold back my feelings any longer. You must have seen it.. But it does not

Subject: Re: Destructor confronts Kit Kat

 Destructor saw his mistake. It had been the wrong time. "I am sorry. I could 
not hold back my feelings any longer. You must have seen it.. But it does not 
matter. I apolagize. What are your orders?" he tried to hind the hurt of her 
reaction to him. But he was unsure it was working. He knew however no matter 
what he could never leave her side. He went down on all four on the ground 
behind her. "Please forgive my ignorance. " a quick tear fewll down his face 
but it immediatly evaporated.
